description: Broker uses various number formats - AI should normalize all to plain numbers

messages.content: Hi Luke, what are the full specs for 135 Trade Center Court?

Hey Jill,

Here you go:
- Size: 18,500 square feet
- Rent: $7.50 per square foot per year NNN
- CAM/NNN: approximately $2.15/SF/YR
- Doors: three (3) dock doors, one drive-in
- Clear: twenty-four feet
- Electrical: 200 amp 3-phase

Luke

notes: AI should normalize 'three (3)' to '3', 'twenty-four' to '24', etc.
